title: Passenger vehicle wholesales rise 13.54 % in May at 3,34,247 units, SIAM says
description: The Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM) reported a 13.54% increase in the wholesale of domestic passenger vehicles, totaling 3,34,247 units in May, as compared to the same period last year. The latest data from SIAM reveals that manufacturers delivered 2,94,392 units of passenger vehicles (PVs) to dealers in May 2022.â€‹ In May, the wholesale of domestic two-wheelers reached 14,71,550 units, marking a 17.42% growth compared to May of the previous year when it was 12,53,187 units.
